## Hi there 👋

I'm Mezi Apronny — a DevOps Engineer who loves building software and writing code that solves real problems.

- 🔭 I’m currently working as a DevOps Engineer at [@tiket.com](https://www.tiket.com)
- 💻 I enjoy coding, automating workflows, and building tools to help developers move faster and safer.
- 🛠 I often build internal tools, developer platforms, and CI/CD automation using Go, Bash, Groovy, and GitOps practices.
- 🌱 I’m currently exploring DevSecOps, Red/Blue Team Security, and Internal Developer Platforms.
- 👯 I’m open to collaborating on DevOps tools, platform engineering, or side projects that improve developer experience.
- 💬 Ask me about CI/CD, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Backstage.io, Go, or cloud infrastructure.
- 📫 Reach me on Twitter: [@meziaris](https://twitter.com/meziaris)
- ⚡ Fun fact: I started as a developer, and I never stopped loving code.

### 🚀 Projects
Some things I’ve worked on:

- 🧩 **Internal Developer Platform** – A self-service portal using Backstage.io to manage 1000+ microservices and resources.
- ⚙️ **CI/CD Modular Pipeline Library (MPL)** – Designed and built Jenkins Shared Libraries using Groovy to support GitOps workflows, multi-language services (Go, Java, Next.js), and custom deployment stages.
- 🔐 **Security-first DevOps** – Automated static and dynamic security checks (Trivy, SonarQube, SBOM) into every pipeline.
